field.name: summary
field.value: Fixed enum flag values for JQueryGenerator.Position

field.name: description
field.value:
The values for the JQueryGenerator.Position flags were written as decimal powers of 2 (1,2,4,8,16,32,etc.) but specified as hexadecimal values (i.e., 0x16 instead of either 16 or 0x10). The attached patch changes them to use the correct hex values.
I'm not sure if this actually matters, since the code doesn't seem to use the Position enum type as a set of combined flags anywhere (and I'm not sure that it would make any sense to have a combination of those elements to begin with). It might be better to eliminate the [Flags] attribute and the specific field values entirely.

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
